text: Do something every day that you don’t want to do. This is the golden rule for acquiring the habit of doing your duty without pain.
Sometimes I sits and thinks, sometimes I just sits
from: A poster of contemplative gorilla, from an HN comment

text: Sometimes I walks and thinks, sometimes I just walks and walks
Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.
The doer alone learneth.
Fall seven times, stand up eight
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Failure is just another way to learn how to do something right.
A habit cannot be tossed out the window; it must be coaxed down the stairs a step at a time.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
from: J.R.R. Tolkein, The Fellowship of the Ring

text: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
The only journey is the one within.
Fail often so you can succeed sooner.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.
The best way out is always through.
I failed my way to success.
Drop by drop is the water pot filled.
Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
Assiduity, it means sit down until you do it. Commit yourself to your work and study.
from: Lucas Remmerswaal, The A-Z of 13 Habits

text: Follow your honest convictions, and stay strong.
The truth is that everyone is bored, and devotes himself to cultivating habits.
Nothing will work unless you do.
There is no more miserable human being than one in whom nothing is habitual but indecision.
Years teach us more than books.
Take time to deliberate; but when the time for action arrives, stop thinking and go in.
Do or do not. There is no try.
Every artist was first an amateur.
The only people who never fail are those who never try.
When your days are small, routine is the only scaffolding that holds you together.
from: Joanna Cannon, Three Things About Elsie

text: Start today, not tomorrow. If anything, you should have started yesterday.
Everything started as nothing.
You cannot depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
Nothing so needs reforming as other people’s habits.
Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
He who begins many things finishes but few
We can do anything we want to do if we stick to it long enough.
Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
Commitment leads to action. Action brings your dream closer.
